text: Intap pumiyai vacikkat takka itamaka akkiyavanum, atanitaiye arukalai untakkiyavanum; atarkaka (atan mitu acaiya) malaikalai untakkiyavanum iru katalkalukkitaiye tatuppai untakkiyavanum yar? Allahvutan (veru) nayan irukkinrana? Illai! (Eninum) avarkalil perumpalor ariyatavarkalaka irukkinranar
